title: Transactional analysis
creator_credit: McGraw-Hill Films, CRM Productions and Joan D. Owens
brief_description: A training film intended to overcome managerial resistance to suggestions of the “Yes but…” variety. Based on Eric Berne’s book “Games people play” and the concept that we are made up of parent, adult and child parts of our personality.
